title: The Synergistic Combination of Curcumin and Polydatin Improves Temozolomide Efficacy on Glioblastoma Cells
content: Glioblastoma (GBL) is one of the more malignant primary brain tumors, currently treated by a multimodality strategy including surgery, radio- and chemotherapy, mainly consisting of Temozolomide(TMZ)-based chemotherapy. Tumor relapse often occurs due to the establishment of TMZ resistance, with a patient median survival
